data.title: Scarface: The World Is Yours credits (Windows, 2006)
data.meta_description: The official game credits for Scarface: The World Is Yours released on Windows in 2006. The credits include 635 people.
data.text:
MobyPro Early Access

People credited on this game were also credited on:

Crash of the Titans, a group of 203 people

Scarface: Money. Power. Respect., a group of 164 people

Crash: Mind over Mutant, a group of 145 people

The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction, a group of 136 people

Crash Tag Team Racing, a group of 135 people
